title: Husbandry
description: The world is full of friends and food

children.title: Bee Our Guest
children.description: Use a Campfire to collect Honey from a Beehive using a Bottle without aggravating the Bees

children.title: Wax On
children.description: Apply Honeycomb to a Copper block!

children.title: Wax Off
children.description: Scrape Wax off of a Copper block!

children.title: The Parrots and the Bats
children.description: Breed two animals together

children.title: Two by Two
children.description: Breed all the animals!

children.title: You've Got a Friend in Me
children.description: Have an Allay deliver items to you

children.title: Birthday Song
children.description: Have an Allay drop a Cake at a Note Block

children.title: Whatever Floats Your Goat!
children.description: Get in a Boat and float with a Goat

children.title: Best Friends Forever
children.description: Tame an animal

children.title: A Complete Catalogue
children.description: Tame all Cat variants!

children.title: Glow and Behold!
children.description: Make the text of a Sign glow

children.title: Fishy Business
children.description: Catch a fish

children.title: Tactical Fishing
children.description: Catch a Fish... without a Fishing Rod!

children.title: The Cutest Predator
children.description: Catch an Axolotl in a Bucket

children.title: The Healing Power of Friendship
children.description: Team up with an Axolotl and win a fight

children.title: Total Beelocation
children.description: Move a Bee Nest, with 3 Bees inside, using Silk Touch

children.title: Bukkit Bukkit
children.description: Catch a Tadpole in a Bucket

children.title: When the Squad Hops into Town
children.description: Get each Frog variant on a Lead

children.title: With Our Powers Combined!
children.description: Have all Froglights in your inventory

children.title: A Seedy Place
children.description: Plant a seed and watch it grow

children.title: A Balanced Diet
children.description: Eat everything that is edible, even if it's not good for you

children.title: Serious Dedication
children.description: Use a Netherite Ingot to upgrade a Hoe, and then reevaluate your life choices
